name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.createPattern
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createPattern() method of the Canvas 2D API creates a pattern using the specified image and repetition. This method returns a CanvasPattern.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.createPattern' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
